short_summary: The CFIA has a requirement fior two (2) Level 3 Programmer/Software Developers with substantial experties in SampleiManager implementation and support.
description: The CFIA has a requirement, for two (2), Level 3 Programmer/Software Developers with substantial expertise, in SampleManager implmentation and support.The level 3 requirement, will be judgd based on document.shos and interviews. See, the Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP), for details.
